title: SHM - change to make period the same

content.description: Two systems are in oscillation: a simple pendulum consisting of a sphere on a long string that swings through a very small angle, and a block oscillating on a spring. The block-spring system takes twice as much time as the sphere-string system to complete one oscillation.
content.question: Which of the following changes could make the two systems oscillate with the same period?

choices.label: Increasing the mass of the sphere
Decreasing the angle through which the sphere swings
Decreasing the mass of both the block and the sphere

content.answer: Decreasing the mass of both the block and the sphere
